title: Driver never picked us up
text:
Waited 25-30 minutes for driver.  Three people were standing in hot sun looking for the ride that never came.  She said she was there and although I had told her where we were (in Uber waiting area) and what we were wearing, we never saw her.  She called and four minutes later, I called her and left message.  She cancelled trip, so  I had to start all over.  There is no way that she was in the right place.  Now, I‚Äôve been charged for a ride that we didn‚Äôt take.

The ride before and the subsequent ride were great, but this was a horrible experience.

title: Driver Refused to complete the ride
text:
Driver inputted, incorrect address, and refused to drop us off at the correct location.
He stated he had another job  and could not complete the ride.  Driver left us off at a random gas station for us to find another solution to his mistake.

We were late arriving at a destination. This is totally unacceptable. How can this situation be rectified ? Please credit my account. 

Marlene ODonnell

H

title: Great music and friendly driver

title: Steven

title: Lie
text: They lie about how long it will take for the driver to come so that you pick it over Lyft. If the driver is ‚Äú7 minutes away‚Äù and they come at 12 minutes. That‚Äôs over 50% off that‚Äôs intentionally misleading especially when it‚Äôs that off regularly.

title: Starting not not like.
text: I‚Äôm tired of the wait time being short and then I get stuck waiting 20-25 mins. then when u get a driver they are far away like, how do u expect others to spend money when u can‚Äôt even get them to their destination. Also, if you‚Äôre planning to even drive someone , you might as well drive everybody.

title: Uber trip
text: The app said one price but now Uber is trying to charge me an additional $40 for the trip. Not sure what‚Äôs that about but it‚Äôs a scam, all fees should be established when it states the cost.

title: Y‚Äôall just robbed me

title: Wait time
text: It‚Äôs 7:00am, I tried to get a driver to drive me for a 10 minute drive. Uber estimated the cost would be around $15. I was waiting for the app to find me a driver but I waited about 20 minutes and the app still hadn‚Äôt found a driver. Because of this I cancelled the request and it notified me that I might not want to do that because if I try again the wait may take just as long. I still decided to hit cancel because I figured I could get someone I know to pick me up. After cancelling the same rides that would have costed $15 showed to be $30 now that I had cancelled waiting. I just think this is very shady of the company to punish their customer for their long wait time. They also didn‚Äôt even give a warning that this would happen from cancelling the Uber search. I should not have to pay DOUBLE for an Uber if your app is being slow. Ridiculous.
